name: Linux Mint 22 (Virginia)
install_guide_markdown: 1. Download the Cinnamon ISO. 2. Verify SHA256. 3. Write to USB with balenaEtcher. 4. Boot and install (automatic partitioning is fine).

install_steps.title: Download and verify
install_steps.detail_md: Grab the Cinnamon edition for the flagship experience and verify integrity.

install_steps.title: Create bootable USB
install_steps.detail_md: Use balenaEtcher or Rufus in ISO mode. Secure Boot supported.

install_steps.title: Install Mint
install_steps.detail_md: Choose automatic partitioning and install codecs during setup for best experience.

install_steps.title: Update system
install_steps.detail_md: Open Update Manager or run `sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade`.

privacy_notes: No telemetry. Update Manager can send anon mirror metrics if enabled.
notes: Great out-of-the-box experience with multimedia codecs and a Windows-like workflow.
